title: Doraemon: 2112-nen Doraemon Tanjou
original_name: ドラえもん ２１１２年ドラえもん誕生
ending_song: "Boku Doraemon 2112 (ぼくドラえもん 2112)" by Nobuyo Ooyama, Koorogi '73 (Chorus)
sinopse: The movie is sort of a prequel to the entire series, it showed the life of Doraemon before traveling to the 20th century: How he was made, how he was partially broken, how he lost his ears, how he met the Nobi family and decides to return to the past to help Nobita.
